flavor_text_entries.gold:
If you become
enchanted by its
smooth, elegant, dance-like kicks,
you may get
drilled hard.
flavor_text_entries.silver:
It launches kicks
while spinning. If
it spins at high speed, it may bore
its way into the
ground.
flavor_text_entries.crystal:
After doing a
handstand to
throw off the opponent's timing,
it presents its
fancy kick moves.
flavor_text_entries.ruby:
HITMONTOP spins on its head at high
speed, all the while delivering kicks.
This technique is a remarkable mix of both offense and defense at the same
time. The POKéMON travels faster
spinning than it does walking.
flavor_text_entries.sapphire:
HITMONTOP spins on its head at high
speed, all the while delivering kicks.
This technique is a remarkable mix of both offense and defense at the same
time. The POKéMON travels faster
spinning than it does walking.
flavor_text_entries.emerald:
Its technique of kicking while spinning is
a remarkable mix of both offense and
defense. HITMONTOP travel faster
spinning than they do walking.
flavor_text_entries.firered:
It launches kicks while spinning. If it
spins at high speed, it may bore its way
into the ground.
flavor_text_entries.leafgreen:
If you become enchanted by its smooth,
elegant, dance-like kicks, you may get
drilled hard.
flavor_text_entries.diamond:
It fights while spinning like a top.
The centrifugal force boosts its
destructive power by ten.
